content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ExternalTable]
(
	 CustomerID int,
	NameStyle char,
	Title char,
	FirstName char,
	MiddleName char,
	LastName char,
	Suffix char,
	CompanyName char,
	SalesPerson char,
	EmailAddress char,
	Phone char,
	PasswordHash char,
	PasswordSalt char,
	rowguid char,
	ModifiedDate timestamp,
  input_filename char,
  DT_load timestamp
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/folder/file',
	DATA_SOURCE = [DataSource1],
	FILE_FORMAT = [FileFormat1]
)
